articles.author: Camilo  Montoya-Galvez
articles.title: U.S. to probe "anti-American" views of those applying for immigration benefits under Trump directive - CBS News
articles.description: The Trump administration has directed officials to probe any "anti-American" views and activities of immigrants applying for immigration benefits like green cards and work permits.
articles.content: The Trump administration has directed government officials to probe any "anti-American" views and activities of immigrants applying for immigration benefits like green cards and work permits, further… [+3997 chars]
